extensionName.description: The name of the extension, displayed in the web store and browser.

extensionDescription.message: 为网页内容生成可折叠的目录，支持CSS选择器配置，并提供元素拾取。点击扩展图标可按站点启用/禁用。
extensionDescription.description: A short description of the extension's purpose and features.

browserActionTitle.description: The tooltip text displayed when hovering over the extension's icon in the browser toolbar.
